quotes.quote: Tis a lesson you should heed. Try, try, try again. If at first you don't succeed, Try, try, try again.
There is no failure except in no longer trying.
There is no comparison between that which is lost by not succeeding and that which is lost by not trying.
The best angle from which to approach a problem is the Try-angle.
It is common sense to take a method and try it. If it fails, admit it frankly and try another. But above all, try something.
Trying is a part of failing. If you are afraid to fail then you're afraid to try.
Try, try, try, and keep on trying is the rule that must be followed to become an expert in anything.
I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
My father used to say that it's never too late to do anything you wanted to do. And he said,  You never know what you can accomplish until you try.
Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
How long should you try? Until.
I try. I am trying. I was trying. I will try. I shall in the meantime try. I sometimes have tried. I shall still by that time be trying.
In the end, the only people who fail are those who do not try.
Try and fail, but don't fail to try.
Trying is always enough.
The unwillingness to try is worse than any failure.
You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
To try and fail is at least to learn; to fail to try is to suffer the inestimable loss of what might have been.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
You can't always get what you want, but if you try sometimes, you might find, you get what you need.
Success is achieved and maintained by those who TRY, And keep TRYING. Where there is nothing to lose by TRYING, And a great deal to gain if SUCCESSFUL, By all means, TRY. DO IT NOW.
For us, there is only the trying. The rest is not our business.
If you don't make mistakes, you aren't really trying.
You're never a loser until you quit trying.
There's doubt in trying. Just do it or stop thinking.
If you never stop trying you'll never give up. If you never give up you'll never stop trying.
